name: Cold Storage Chamber

specifications.cor: White RAL 9003 or matte stainless steel
specifications.aplicacao: Cold storage chambers (low and medium temperature)

hero.title: Cold Storage Chamber
hero.description: Robust panels for cold storage chambers, ensuring efficient thermal insulation and durability in extreme temperatures.

categoryDescription.title: Isoart Cold Storage Chamber Panels offer exceptional thermal insulation for low and medium temperature environments.
categoryDescription.description: Isoart Cold Storage Chamber Panels are designed to maintain controlled temperatures in refrigeration and freezing chambers. With polyisocyanurate (PIR) or expanded polystyrene (EPS) core and pre-painted or stainless steel coating, they guarantee high thermal efficiency, moisture resistance and ease of cleaning, ideal for food, logistics and pharmaceutical industries.

benefits.title: Superior thermal insulation
benefits.description: Maintains stable temperatures, reducing refrigeration costs.

benefits.title: Moisture resistance
benefits.description: Materials that prevent infiltration and condensation.

benefits.title: Easy hygiene
benefits.description: Smooth surfaces that facilitate cleaning and maintenance.

generalCharacteristics: PIR core (30-38 kg/m³) or EPS (15-20 kg/m³)
AISI 304 stainless steel or pre-painted galvalume coating
High fire resistance (Class R1 for PIR)

applications.title: Robust solutions for cold storage chambers with thermal efficiency and durability
applications.description: Isoart Cold Storage Chamber Panels are ideal for environments that require rigorous temperature control, such as food, logistics and pharmaceutical industries. With high moisture resistance and easy maintenance, they guarantee energy efficiency and longevity.

tabDescriptions.Thermal insulation: The PIR core (conductivity 0.022 W/m.K) or EPS ensures exceptional thermal insulation, maintaining temperatures from -40°C to 0°C and reducing refrigeration costs in cold storage chambers.
tabDescriptions.Sealing and resistance: The male-female interlocking system and stainless steel or galvalume coatings ensure tightness, moisture resistance and protection against condensation, ideal for humid environments.
tabDescriptions.Easy hygiene: Smooth surfaces in stainless steel or pre-painted facilitate cleaning, meeting sanitary standards for food and pharmaceutical industries.
tabDescriptions.Sustainability and durability: Resistant to corrosion, Isoart panels guarantee long service life with minimal maintenance. The use of pentane as an expansion agent in PIR ensures environmental compliance, without HCFC emissions, meeting the Montreal Protocol.
